channel.title: B-Rank: Defend the WhiteEye Princess!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "B-Rank: Defend the WhiteEye Princess!"

item.title: Re: B-Rank: Defend the WhiteEye Princess!
item.content:encoded: You can get it from Ninjutsu but not Tajutsu. When requesting specialized missions, it only considers the primary stat, not the secondary stat. But you can definitely get this mission from requesting Nin missions, you don't need to request general missions.

item.title: B-Rank: Defend the WhiteEye Princess!
item.content:encoded: Can you get this mission by requesting Ninjutsu or Taijutsu missions, or do you have to pick a general one?
